info.title: Library Management API
info.description: API documentation for the Library Management System

post.description: Registers a user with name, email, and password.
Logs in a user and returns a JWT token.

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's details.

post.description: Generates a new token for authenticated users.
Logs out the currently authenticated user.

get.description: Get a paginated list of books with search functionality. The list includes book details along with borrower information.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Search term to filter books by name or details

post.description: Adds a new book to the system with the provided name, details, and automatically generates a slug.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific book by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the book to retrieve

message.example: No book found with this ID, please try again with a valid ID.

put.description: Update the details of an existing book, including its name and details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the book to be updated

delete.description: Delete a book from the system. If the book is borrowed, it cannot be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the book to be deleted

412.description: Precondition failed: Book is currently borrowed

post.description: Allow users to borrow a book if it's available. The book's status is updated, and a record is created in the borrow history.

400.description: Bad request, user has already borrowed this book or the book is already borrowed by another user

post.description: Allow users to return a book they have borrowed. The book's status is updated and a return entry is created in the borrow history.

borrow_id.description: ID of the borrow history record.

book_id.description: ID of the book to return.

400.description: Bad request, invalid book ID, borrow ID, or book return attempt

get.summary: Get a list of borrowed books
get.description: Retrieve a list of books that the authenticated user has borrowed. Supports pagination and search functionality.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Search term to filter borrowed books by name

get.summary: Get a list of users who borrowed a specific book
get.description: Retrieve a list of users who have borrowed a specific book. Supports pagination and search functionality.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Search term to filter users who borrowed the book (by name or email)

200.description: Successfully fetched borrowed users for the book

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of roles with role ID, name, and slug.

post.description: Adds a new role to the system with a unique name and generates a slug.

get.description: Fetch the details of a specific role based on its ID, including role name and slug.

put.description: Update the name and slug of a specific role based on its ID.

delete.description: Delete a specific role by its ID. If there are users associated with the role, deletion will be prevented.

412.description: Precondition failed (Users associated with this role)

details.example: A novel written by F. Scott Fitzgerald.

borrow_user_id.description: The ID of the user who borrowed the book, if any
